fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm SSL renewal periodic task fixture loads
fields.request_details:
1. From the suite directory run 'python manage.py loaddata core/fixtures/celery_periodictask__renew_ssl_certificate.json' and confirm the command completes without errors.
2. In Django admin, open Celery periodic tasks and verify the 'renew-ssl-certificate' entry exists, is enabled, and targets the monthly 03:00 UTC schedule.
3. Inspect the task detail page and confirm the Description matches the fixture and the Last modified timestamp updated after reloading the fixture.
